feed.title: WordPress ActivityPub Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 2.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Try to lookup local users first by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/782
  • More efficient WP_User_Query with count_total=false by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/781
  • doc: remove comma between subject and predicate by @foxyseta in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/670
  • added screen-reader-text by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/792
  • Add the Fediverse creator of a post to opengraph by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/786

New Contributors

  • @foxyseta made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/670

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/2.4.0...2.5.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 2.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Support Drafts! by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/780
  • Support Blog-User only mode! by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/795
  • Update dependencies by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/797
  • Update class-create.php by @janboddez in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/801
  • Update object_id_to_comment's PHPDoc by @janboddez in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/802
  • Revert to @wordpress/scripts@27 by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/806
  • Fix Fatal Error: wp_schedule_single_event third argument is being passed as a string by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/809
  • Add extra fields by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/762
  • Some Remote-Follow improvements by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/805

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/2.5.0...2.6.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 2.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix extra fields by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/814

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/2.6.0...2.6.1

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add setting to enable/disable the fediverse:creator OGP tag by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/815
  • Add "Header Image" support by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/816
  • Tag support for Actors by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/812
  • Add link header by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/817
  • Add "reply context" support by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/819

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/2.6.1...3.0.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add line brakes to user biography by @danielhuesken in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/829
  • Changed missing activitypub_user_description to activitypub_description by @danielhuesken in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/830
  • Fix undefined get_sample_permalink by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/832
  • Only send Update for previously-published posts by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/833
  • Add ordering for Extra fields by @danielhuesken in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/827

New Contributors

  • @danielhuesken made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/829

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.0.0...3.1.0
